item.title: Paschi Board May Meet to Raise Mediobanca Bid, Report Says
item.description: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA could call a board meeting on Monday to decide on whether to raise its bid for rival Mediobanca SpA, according to a report in an Italian newspaper.

item.title: Mediobanca Investors Tender 13% in Paschi Bid’s First Big Win
item.description: Mediobanca SpA investors tendered about 13% of the company’s shares to Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA, giving the Siena-based lender the first significant win in a takeover bid for its Milanese r

item.title: Mediobanca Profit Rises After Stashing Less for Bad Loans
item.description: Mediobanca SpA reported higher profit after setting aside less money for loans turning sour, as the Italian lender seeks to fend off an unwanted takeover by rival Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA.

item.title: Mediobanca Profit Rises After Stashing Less for Bad Loans
item.description: Mediobanca SpA reported higher profit after setting aside less money for loans turning sour, as the Italian lender seeks to fend off an unwanted takeover by rival Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA.
